headline: 3 Reasons to Sell STZ and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Although the S&P 500 is down 5.8% over the past six months, Constellation Brands’s stock price has fallen further to $192.82, losing shareholders 18.4% of their capital. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
